import React, {useState} from "react" import { ChartDonut } from '@patternfly/react-charts'; import fatsImg from '../assets/trans-fat.png' import caloriesImg from '../assets/calories.png' import carbohydratesImg from '../assets/wheat.png' import proteinsImg from '../assets/molecule.png' function ProductsBlock({name, kcal, proteins, fats, carbohydrates}) { const [isOpenProduct, setIsOpenProduct] = useState(false); let all = carbohydrates + proteins + fats; return (
{name} setIsOpenProduct(!isOpenProduct)}> {isOpenProduct === false ? "Подробнее" : "Свернуть"}

Калорийность(кКал){kcal}

Белки(г.){proteins}

Жиры(г.){fats}

Углеводы(г.){carbohydrates}

Соотношение белков, жиров и углеводов:
`${datum.x}: ${Math.round(datum.y)}%`} width={150} />
) } export default ProductsBlock
